0.Name: Sign
0.Text: YE WHO ENTER THESE TREACHEROUS GROUNDS, PREPARE FOR THE BATTLE OF A LIFETIME!!!

0.Name: Me
0.Text: I can't believe they let me write that.

1.Name: Me
1.Text: I don't even want to look at it anymore.

0.Name: Me
0.Text: Better get out of here before he wakes up...

1.Name: Me
1.Text: Good thing we had that baby blanket left over after construction.

0.Name: Boss
0.Text: Hey! What are you still doing down there?

0.Name: Boss
0.Text: Now get out of there before he wakes up!

0.Name: Me
0.Text: Well, I'm right next to the elevator, I should make it out in time.

0.Name: Sign
0.Text: LYING BEYOND YE ARE DEADLY TRAPS NOT BEKNOWNST TO THE LANDS OF MAN

0.Name: Greg
0.Text: yoooooo! sup skelly. watcha doin around here?

0.Name: Me
0.Text: Hey Greg. Could ask you the same.

0.Name: Greg
0.Text: chill bruh, you know how its been with jess, i gotta dungeon-surf for a bit.

0.Name: Me
0.Text: I just lost my keys, gotta take the long route back.

1.Name: Greg
1.Text: same as you, spiked myself. best way to get around.

1.Name: Me
1.Text: I gotta do that again??? It realllly hurts...

1.Name: Greg
1.Text: that's what I'M sayin. gotta call OSHA or some shit.
